newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: S.African trade delegation to visit Middle East.
newsitem.headline: S.African trade delegation to visit Middle East.

text.p: A South African trade delegation will visit three countries in the Middle East, including Iran, in October to foster stronger ties with the region, the Department of Trade and Industry said on Thursday.
The delegation will be led by deputy trade minister Phumzile Mlambo-Ngcuka and will visit Iran, the United Arab Emirates and Saudi Arabia.
"Similiar to earlier initiatives in other parts of the world, this mission aims to further trade relations with the Middle East region," the department said.
The visit to Iran will coincide with the participation of South Africa in the 22nd Iran International Trade Fair taking place in Tehran from October 2.
